job.title: Site Reliability Engineer (100% Remote)
job.description: <p>As a&nbsp;<strong>Site Reliability Engineer</strong>, you will be part developer, part operations, all continuous integration and delivery expert; you will be integral to the design, set up, automation, and maintenance of our entire integration and delivery pipeline. The ideal candidate should have a deep software development background married with effective intercommunication skills to promote compromise with developers, support engineers, customers, and senior management.&nbsp;They will be embedded within the development teams, working with our clients and other engineers and developers gathering requirements, architecting and communicating an end-to-end, automated CI/CD pipeline.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Create and maintain ansible automation scripts for essential tools, services, and configurations.</li><li>Create automation frameworks and write automation scripts for moving code through the SDLC process, including testing scripts</li><li>Seek and explore opportunities to automate all operational activities.</li><li>Design, develop and deploy automation solutions to enable self service capabilities for end users.</li><li>Write robust frontend and backend API automation tests.</li><li>Design and develop automated solutions across several services and systems in a cross-functional, agile environment.</li></ul><p><strong>Knowledge and Skills:</strong></p><ul><li>Strong ansible and AWS Cloud Development Kit and CloudFormation Template development skills.</li><li>Advanced automated script design, coding, debugging, and maintenance skills (using bash, python, etc).</li><li>Strong experience in CI/CD toolsets (e.g. AWS Code Pipeline/Code Build, Jenkins, GitLab, etc).</li><li>Patience and tolerance for when things just go wrong.</li><li>Skilled and disciplined to work remote with a distributed team.</li><li>Excellent communications skills (written, verbal, &amp; virtual).</li><li>Strong drive, self-motivated, logical, and detail-oriented.</li><li>Passion for new technologies, software &amp; processes.</li><li>Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment with multiple deadlines is essential.</li><li>Other tools: Packer, Docker, Selenium, ReadyAPI (SoapUI Pro, LoadUI Pro, ServiceV Pro)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</li></ul><p></p>
